pkgmetadata.longdescription: ðŸ“¦ pkg-info===========Tiny library to fetch package info from `PyPI <https://pypi.org/>`_.Install-------``pipenv install pkg_info``or``pip install pkg_info``Usage-----.. code-block:: python from pkg_info import get_pkg_info pkg = get_pkg_info('requests') pkg.name # 'requests' pkg.version # '2.18.4' pkg.author.name # 'Kenneth Reitz'List of supported properties----------------------------.. code:: yaml name: str license: str summary: str description: str version: str keywords: str homepage: str url: str author: - name: str - email: str maintainer: - name: str - email: str
